titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for inclusion of the services of licensed (registered) nurses under the medicare and medicaid programs.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to include medical care, or other remedial care as defined by State law, furnished by licensed registered nurses among the services to be provided under the Medicaid and Medicare programs.
